name: Season Shift
description:
Season Shift is a plaftformer adventure game made for Booom GameJam . It told a story of a squirrel Schrödinger‘s journey throughtout the seasons. 

You can download the sourcecode file to play it on PICO-8 virtual console or just simply try it on browser.

Controll

zJumpxPress to interact or hold to reset the levelarrow keysDirection

Tips: If you hit a bug like stucking into a wall, just hold x key to reset the level.
